Count up

Goodkit Exclusive

Dependency-free, lightweight JavaScript class that can be used to quickly create animations that display numerical data in a more interesting way.

Plugin Documentation

: :

<h1 class="font-family-sans-serif mb-0">
  <span data-countup data-from="0" data-to="17"></span>:
  <span data-countup data-from="0" data-to="56"></span>:
  <span data-countup data-from="0" data-to="59"></span>
</h1>

Inview

Combine CountUp.js with AOS to start the animation when an element becomes visible.

<h1 class="font-family-sans-serif mb-0" data-countup data-from="0" data-to="256" data-aos data-aos-id="countup:in"></h1>

Price

Combined wuth CountUp.js, the pricing component helps you toggle between two pricing options with a custom switch.

Keep it simple

Simple, fair pricing.

<!-- Switch -->
<div class="custom-control custom-switch">
  <input type="checkbox" class="custom-control-input" id="customSwitch1" data-toggle="prices" data-target=".price">
  <label class="custom-control-label" for="customSwitch1"></label>
</div>

<!-- Price -->
<span class="price" data-min-value="19" data-max-value="29">19</span>
